title: Shrubs and Grasses
description: A grassy meadow punctuated by shrub and scrub. Small shrubs and stunted trees poke out of the grasses sporadically. Wildflowers grow among the grasses. Lush, green grasses wave gently in the wind. The land is gently sloped down to the north, gently sloped up to the east, gently sloped up to the south, gently sloped down to the west.
